/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling intersection in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from a car on the road, providing a driver's perspective of the city's daily life. The sun shines brightly in the clear blue sky, casting a warm glow over the scene. The roads are filled with cars, their metallic bodies gleaming under the sunlight. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the sides of the roads, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. The image is taken from a low angle, adding a sense of depth and perspective to the scene.
